name: stickybits
description: Stickybits is a lightweight alternative to `position: sticky` polyfills

scripts.build: npm run test:unit && npm run build:rollup
scripts.chore:delete-branch: if git show-ref --quiet refs/heads/chore-changelog; then git branch -D chore-changelog; fi
scripts.chore:pr: git add . && git commit -m '[chore] updates changelog' --no-verify && git push origin chore-changelog -f
scripts.chore: npm run chore:delete-branch && npm run chore:branch && npm run chore:changelog && npm run chore:pr
scripts.postpublish: git tag $npm_package_version && git push origin --tags && npm run chore
scripts.release: npm run lint && npm run build && npm test && npm run report:coverage
scripts.test:es-check: es-check es5 dist/stickybits.min.js dist/stickybits.js dist/jquery.stickybits.js dist/jquery.stickybits.min.js dist/umbrella.stickybits.js dist/umbrella.stickybits.min.js
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:acceptance

author: Jeff Wainwright <yowainwright@gmail.com> (https://jeffry.in)
